title: Our Teachers
subtitle: Experts in Spanish language instruction
description: We have highly qualified native teachers with experience teaching Spanish as a foreign language. Meet our team of passionate professionals eager to share their language and culture.

natan.name: Natan Julian Mitros
natan.title: Spanish teacher
natan.bio:
Hello! My name is Natan and I will be happy to be your Spanish teacher. Since I was a child I have always been passionate about languages and now I would like to share this passion with you by teaching you Spanish.

I have more than 3 years of experience teaching Spanish, both in individual classes and in groups. My classes are always 100% adapted to the student's needs. In my classes we never get bored and I always focus on you understanding everything we are doing. I have a Bachelor's Degree in Modern Languages from the University of Valencia (Spain).

Don't wait any longer and book your first class with me :)

Experience: 3+ years teaching Spanish to students from more than 20 different countries.

mili.name: Mili
mili.title: Spanish teacher
mili.bio:
Hello! I'm Mili, an online Spanish tutor with over 3 years of experience. I'm a native speaker, born in Argentina and have lived in Spain for many years, so I have a broad understanding of the language and its varieties.

I specialize in personalized classes tailored to each student, regardless of age. I create a warm and safe space for you to speak confidently from day one. I design each class to fit your interests, goals, and learning style.

Whether you need Spanish for travel, work, to communicate better in your daily life, or to start from scratch, Iâ€™d be delighted to help you.

Experience: 3+ years of experience with all ages; from 5 years old to over 65.
